title: Replay Applications
body:
Hi,

I was wondering if this application is allowed for LoL.
http://store.overwolf.com/app/Overwolf-Replay_HUD

Thanks!

replies.body:
From what I could pull from Riot's stances on certain 3rd party applications, it seems like Riot's not actioning on Overwolf at this time; if they do change that stance in the future, they will likely send out an announcement informing players before actioning. For some more information, check out this thread:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/5dmkJinG-3rd-party-applicationsmodifications-whats-allowed-and-what-isnt

Hey there,

Riot does not release an official list of third party applications that they currently action on for many reasons, I've followed up with a few people and have confirmed there is no official stance on this application specifically.

In short, using **_ANY_**  third party application is against the TOS and while Riot may not action on it immediately, there is still the possibility of your account being banned. It is up to you if you wish to take the risk of using this tool.
